channel.title: Need bit help. noob problem

item.title: Need bit help. noob problem
item.dc:creator: @exorta exorta
item.description:
@exorta wrote:

Look, i coded this to let people not connect with the owner’s name and it doesn’t work… what have i done wrong? thanks.

if(playerName.contains("*******") && !connectedFrom.equals("**.**.**.**.*")){ println("Not from localhost!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; savefile = false; return; }
i need to code the right code that people cannot connect with the name ********/ when you put a / after the name you can always login to the account. in this case the owner's acc. this doesnt work:
if(playerName.contains("\")){ returnCode = 20; disconnected = true; return; }
because \ is a anti-code , when you need to explain something you give, for example:
if(playerName.contains("\")){ // this means people cannot connect when a name contains \ returnCode = 20; disconnected = true; return; }
need a bit help on this. thanks.

Read full topic
